divs: sighting detailsplaying ball with grandson in hebron, in and looked up to track ball,noticed object traveling due north. though might be aircraft but studied for a minute but could not see wing or tail sections. straight line and no alt change or sound. finally saw ufo ,try to look at sky as much as possible with positive results. lost site as it headed due north at about 30* above horizon. aircraft usually nw or se direction\ 2 to 3 min total time
Summary: cylinder,gray/white,dark, blk lines on long axis,no wings or tail section,no sound, 5K ft above wispy clds, comm airfraft usually NW to SE direction ,no wing or tail, had crinkly syrface with dark sharp lines on long axis . ds,
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hebron
There were no other sightings in Hebron on or around October 3rd 2013
